data.name: Business One - Negotiator Plan
data.description: An integrated business product designed to meet all your cash flow requirements. The negotiator plan has certain qualifying criteria and is only available to relationship managed customers.

features.additionalInfo: Interest Rates Availability : Interest rates are available on application.
Periodical Payments from this account can be made.
Overdraft or loan facility available on account, customer must be over 18 years of age.
Cheque access is available , customer must be over 18 years of age
The product includes limited fraud protection features.
Relationship management is available for eligible customers.
Company or business can pay bills using BPAY.
With PayTo, you can see, review and authorise all new PayTo payments for things such as recurring bills, memberships and subscriptions before the money leaves your account.

features.additionalValue: Westpac Business Debit MasterCard / Handycard access
features.additionalInfo: Westpac Business Debit MasterCard / Handycard access available on this account.

Following  fees to be known on application(Transaction Fees  when charge per transaction when the number of free transactions per month is exceeded) : Cheques Written, Cheques Collected, Staff-assisted withdrawal, Staff-assisted deposit, Narrated Credits.
Account enquiries are always free when you use Online Banking.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Business Customers only who are relationship managed.

fees.name: Monthly Plan Fee
fees.additionalInfo: There is no Monthly Plan Fee for this product.

fees.name: Westpac Foreign Transaction Fee - non-AU merchant
fees.additionalInfo: 3% of the $AUD transaction amount where a transaction is made in foreign currency and the merchant or financial institution accepting the card is located outside Australia (comprising of 2% Westpac Processing Fee plus 1% Westpac On-Charged Scheme Fee)

fees.name: Westpac Foreign Transaction Fee - AU merchant
fees.additionalInfo: 2.2% of the $AUD transaction amount where a transaction is made in foreign currency and the merchant or financial institution accepting the card is located in Australia (comprising of 2% Westpac Processing Fee plus 0.2% Westpac On-Charged Scheme Fee).

fees.name: Overseas Withdrawal Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Nil for cash withdrawals from ATMs belonging to institutions in the Global ATM Alliance.

fees.name: Account Enquiries : Business Telephone Banking Self-Service
fees.additionalInfo: 20 free per month, 25c for subsequent enquiries

discounts.additionalInfo: Telephone banking fees are waived when minimum monthly balance is greater than $5,000

fees.name: Account Enquiries : Business Telephone Banking Staff-Assisted
fees.additionalInfo: 20 free per month, 65c for subsequent enquiries

discounts.additionalInfo: Telephone banking fees are waived when minimum monthly balance is greater than $5,000

fees.name: Pay Anyone
fees.additionalInfo: Applicable for transfers to  another Westpac branded account or to any other account

fees.name: Pay Anyone
fees.additionalInfo:
Applicable for transfers to  another Westpac branded account or to any other account
